name: JumpBorn
description:
Follow the orders of your king and return to him along with the two legendary spears of Kaladin and Teft the most famous JumpBorn! But watch where you jump!

Mechanics:

You have to go up to Kredik Shaw, the top of the universe!

To climb that high you will have to master the jumps, while you press "space" you will continue charging the jump up to its maximum jump so think carefully when you have to release it!!

All progress is saved automatically.

The game is made in pixel art.

Music of the main menu is made by, the other songs, sound effects and musics are from the assets of unity, the names of the authors are in the credits of the game.

Game is in English and Spanish.

I hope you enjoy my game.

If you have any problem or bug, tell me in the comments.
